author: dcspark
title: Open-ended Research
description: What research streams can be started or accelerated to keep Cardano competitive?
importance: Blockchain is a quickly evolving field. IOG research has kept Cardano competitive, but it needs to be easier for non-IOG research to occur
success: Written documents (CIPs, research papers, technical articles) that spark debate in the Cardano community and gets added to the roadmap
